Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:35:10
Folder: CNKEPG8 - unplanned outage resolved oracle cloud services (siocs, rics, xoc)
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CNKEPG8_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-05-29 18:31
Subject: Unplanned Outage Resolved: Oracle Cloud Services (SIOCS, RICS, XOC)
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague,

 

We are pleased to inform you that the Oracle Cloud services outage impacting the Store Inventory Operations Cloud System (SIOCS) and related services has now been resolved as of 6:25 PM GST.

 

Service Recovery Summary:

*	SIOCS Integration and Application are now accessible.
*	Inbound and outbound transactions to/from SIOCS have resumed.
*	Sales data integration from XStore is restored.
*	Access to SIOCS, RICS, and XOC services has been restored.

 

Our teams are working on reprocessing transactions backlog and ensuring accuracy of sales and stocks data in SIOCS, Stock deltas are yet to be verified.

 

If you experience any further issues, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by

 <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/support/home>
